author: tfranklin84
title: A Convincing Fall Scene, Fantastic Value
review:
To keep it short, set 40057 Fall Scene is a LEGO store and shop at home exclusive polybag. It has 72 pieces and retails for $7.99. And really, that's the key: at $7.99, I see no reason to not get this set. It has neat mushroom pieces, fall colored "leaves," and a nice 3 minifigure family.

I had fully intended to build this then place the various pieces in my LEGO city. To my surprise, however, this is a pretty convincing little scene all on its own, despite its small price and piece count. It is certainly a neat fall display. It will still likely end up incorporated into my town, but I was pleasantly surprised by how nice it looks all on its own. There's not a ton to say about this set, so I will conclude with some pros and cons to consider if this is a good value for you, either as a stand alone scene or as part of your LEGO town.

Pros:

  • 3 minifigures in an $8 set? Yes, please.
  • wheelbarrow included
  • Love the 3 mushrooms
  • The trees look nice, considering their size
  • Lots of extra "leaf" pieces to throw about
  • The scene as a whole looks better than I expected
  • Simply a fantastic value for $7.99

Cons:

  • It's such a nice looking scene, that I now want a full sized fall set.
  • Too bad some of the neatest polybags are not sold in places where the average person will see them....

 

Overall: This set is lovely for the money. Highly recommended.

author: United_Bricks
title: A realistic Autumn scene.
review:
It's the time of year when the days get darker and colder and the trees shed their skins. I know myself leaves are everywhere this time of year and so cleaning them up is needed. Set 40057 is a Lego Exclusive found both online and at their official stores, at Â£6.99 this may seem steep compared to some other polybags but It's worth it.
I built this not long ago and was overall pleased with the end result, I admire the way Lego has included piece's that are meant to be leaves and they do you look like leaves. The figures are simple, 1 Man, 1 Woman and 1 Girl. The set is a nice addition to any Lego city or collection and fits in well with my Winter village sets. 

I am overall pleased with this set and would defiantly recommend this more than any of the other seasonal polybags released previous to this.
